Is this the gist of the problem: casting between size_t and int64 on 32-bit systems causes memory to not be freed/tracked properly? Just trying to make sure I'm following.

body:
@yaroslavvb yes- though unfortunately I won't be able to play around with the effect of this code for a week or two (traveling).

Is this the gist of the problem: casting between `size_t` and `int64` on 32-bit systems causes memory to not be freed/tracked properly? Just trying to make sure I'm following.
